table.name: vtiger_antransactions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_antransactions` ( `antransactionsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `antransaction_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `invoice_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `payment_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `an_profile_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `an_payment_profile_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `an_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `an_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `an_description` text, `request_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `action_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_antransactionscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_antransactionscf` ( `antransactionsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`antransactionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: vtiger_antransactions
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_antransactions` ADD INDEX `antransactionsid_index` (`antransactionsid`) USING BTREE ;

table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_antransactions` ADD INDEX `invoice_id_index` (`invoice_id`) USING BTREE ;
